Reference

Soils

GetKrigedSoil()

Krige soil data following the methodology of the John et al. (2007).

Soils: Helpers

ExpList()

List of n values which exponentially increases from first to last.

GetAutomatedKrigeParams()

Find the "best" variogram parameters for a given geodata object.

soil_random

Soil data for examples.

Torus translation

abund_index()

Count rows by quadrat-index (conservative warpper of abundanceperquad()).

dist_in_torus()

A general function to calculate distances in a n-dimensional toroid.

luquillo_habitat luquillo_elevation luquillo_tree6_random luquillo_stem6_random

Datasets from fgeo.data.

ExpList()

List of n values which exponentially increases from first to last.

extract_gridsize() extract_plotdim()

Extract plot dimensions from habitat data.

GetAutomatedKrigeParams()

Find the "best" variogram parameters for a given geodata object.

GetKrigedSoil()

Krige soil data following the methodology of the John et al. (2007).

luquillo_top3_sp

A tiny dataset from Luquillo of the three most abundant species.

mat_enframe() mat_enframe_ls()

Convert a matrices to data frames.

soil_random

Soil data for examples.

tt_df()

Gather the output of tt_test_one().

tt_test() tt_test_one()

Torus Translation Test to determine habitat associations of tree species.

Torus translation: Helpers

abundanceperquad()

Abundance, basal area, or agb of every species by quadrat.

extract_gridsize() extract_plotdim()

Extract plot dimensions from habitat data.
